response.overview: When a younger girl called Emily Rose dies, everyone puts blame on the exorcism which was performed on her by Father Moore prior to her death. The priest is arrested on suspicion of murder. The trial begins with lawyer Erin Bruner representing Moore, but it is not going to be easy, as no one wants to believe what Father Moore says is true.
response.tagline: One person's story of faith and possession.
response.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose

titles.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose  - UR

results.name: The Exorcism Of Emily Rose (2005) Official Trailer 1 - Laura Linney Movie
